Token.Abstract: The methods declared by the TKChartDelegate protocol allow the adopting delegate to respond to messages from the TKChart class and thus respond to, and in some affect, operations such as panning, zooming and data animations.
Returns an instance of TKChartPaletteItem based on the specified series and index.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series of the palette item that is being requested.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The item index for the series.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The instance of TKChartPaletteItem that contains style settings for specific series.

Token.Abstract: Returns an instance of TKChartPaletteItem used to draw a single point in chart based on the point index and the series.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The point index within the specified series.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series where the point is contained.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The instance of TKCahrtPaletteItem that contains style settings for specific point.

Token.Abstract: Returns a shape for a specified series and index.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting the shape.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series of the palette item that is being requested.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the series item.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An instance of TKChartPaletteItem that contains style settings for a specific series.

Token.Abstract: Creates an animation for particular series.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series to which the animation will be applied.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: The series' visual state.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The viewport of the plot area.

Token.Abstract: Called on selecting series.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart for which the selection has occurred.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series that is selected.

Token.Abstract: Called when a series is deselected.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart for which the selection change has occurred.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series that is deselected.

Token.Abstract: Called on selecting a point.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart for which the selection change has occurred.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: The data point that is selected.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series that contains the selected point.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the data point within the series.

Token.Abstract: Called when a point is deselected.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart for which the selection change has occurred.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: The data point that is deselected.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series that contains the selected point.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the data point within the series.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate when the chart view is about to start zooming the content.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance displaying the content.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the TKChart zoom factor changed.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance displaying the content.

Token.Abstract: * Tells the delegate when the TKChart is about to start panning the content.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance displaying the content.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the TKChart pan factor changed.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance displaying the content.

Token.Abstract: Called on trackball moved

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart for which the crosshair moved

Parameter.Name: selection
Parameter.Abstract: The array of TKChartSelectionInfo

Token.Abstract: Called when the trackball hides.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance displaying the content.

Parameter.Name: selection
Parameter.Abstract: The array of TKChartSelectionInfo

Token.Abstract: Returns TKChartPointLabel for specific data point.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting the label.

Parameter.Name: dataPoint
Parameter.Abstract: The data point for which a label will be returned.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series of the data point.

Parameter.Name: dataIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the data point.

ReturnValue.Abstract: TKChartPointLabel instance that will be rendered for the data point.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representing the specified point.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: dataPoint
Parameter.Abstract: The data point for which a label is being created.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series of the data point.

Parameter.Name: dataIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the data point.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string for the point label.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representing the specified tick value.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: axis
Parameter.Abstract: The axis.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The tick value.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the tick value.

Token.Abstract: Returns an attributed string representing the specified tick value.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: axis
Parameter.Abstract: The axis.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The tick value.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the tick value.

Token.Abstract: Returns a render for point labels.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series for which labels will be rendered.

Parameter.Name: render
Parameter.Abstract: The series render.

Token.Abstract: Returns TKChartLegendItem instance for series.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The series for which a legend item is requested.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The legend item's index.

Token.Abstract: Called when legend item's styles should be updated.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance requesting this information.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The legend item that will be updated.

Parameter.Name: series
Parameter.Abstract: The legend item's series.

Parameter.Name: index
Parameter.Abstract: The legend item's index.

Token.Abstract: Called when touch occured on a legend item.

Parameter.Name: chart
Parameter.Abstract: The TKChart instance where the event occured.
